name: Rude Archery RC6 Unstable
description:
This mod aim to improve archery.

Arrow modification
- flinthead, ironhead, bone, steel, razor, hardened steel, star metal and obsidian arrow modified.
- Crafting arrow now gives 25 arrows.
- Arrows damage increased by 25-75%
- Arrow weight divided by 10
- Arrow stack multiplied by 10

Specialist ammunitations
- Healing arrow heal more and faster, should clear bleed effects as well. (incompatible with other mods modifying the healing arrow)
- Explosive Arrow do way higher damage on NPC and Players. AoE DoT Fire effect damage and sphere size increased. These modifications shouldn't apply to structures in term of damage done.
- Light Arrow, and finally there shall be light 

Bow modification
- New obsidian bow
changeNote:
- Light Arrow PointLight modification (intensity, radius, color, ...)
- Light arrow craft result x2.5
- Stack x10 and weight x0.1
author: Rudeboy
